name: expressjs-demo-app--parent
description: Parent package for both the Invotastic for Business React client and the NodeJS API server running with Express. This is a set convenience scripts for running Invotastic for Business from the project root directory.
author: Wristband

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.install-all: npm install; npm install --prefix client --legacy-peer-deps; npm install --prefix server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client; npm run lint --prefix server
